decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All security roll shutters should be painted to match the beige colour of the existing building within 6 months of completion of the development.  REASON:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | Details of any railings or other means of enclosure of the roof terrace (to include the height and position) shall be approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority). | All security roll shutters should be painted to match the beige colour of the existing buildiing within 6 months of completion of the development.  REASON:  To ensurethat the materials harmonisse with the surroundings. | Details of any railings or other means of enclosure of the roof terrace (to include the height and position) shall be approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  REASON:  In the interests of teh visual amenity of the area and safety of those using the roof terrace.
description: Alterations at ground floor level to provide a garage with shutters, erection of roof level conservatory for existing first floor flat
